mapper.update:
/* IMMmbrExptSbjMapper.delete */ UPDATE im_mmbr_expt_sbj SET last_mdfer_id = #{lastMdferId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, last_mdfcn_dt = TO_CHAR(SYSDATETIME, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), last_mdfer_ip = #{lastMdferIp, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_yn = 'Y' WHERE mmbr_expt_sbj_id = #{mmbrExptSbjId}
AND del_yn = 'N'
mapper.select:
SELECT A.mmbr_expt_sbj_id AS "mmbrExptSbjId", A.member_srl AS "memberSrl", A.cert_sbj_cdv AS "certSbjCdv", A.line_sbj_cdv AS "lineSbjCdv", A.study_dsr_yn AS "studyDsrYn", A.file_id AS "fileId", A.del_yn AS "delYn", A.frst_reger_id AS "frstRegerId", A.frst_reg_dt AS "frstRegDt", A.frst_reger_ip AS "frstRegerIp", A.last_mdfer_id AS "lastMdferId", A.last_mdfcn_dt AS "lastMdfcnDt", A.last_mdfer_ip AS "lastMdferIp"
FROM im_mmbr_expt_sbj A WHERE A.del_yn = 'N' AND mmbr_expt_sbj_id = #{mmbrExptSbjId}

SELECT A.mmbr_expt_sbj_id AS "mmbrExptSbjId", A.member_srl AS "memberSrl", A.cert_sbj_cdv AS "certSbjCdv", A.line_sbj_cdv AS "lineSbjCdv", A.study_dsr_yn AS "studyDsrYn", A.file_id AS "fileId", A.del_yn AS "delYn", A.frst_reger_id AS "frstRegerId", A.frst_reg_dt AS "frstRegDt", A.frst_reger_ip AS "frstRegerIp", A.last_mdfer_id AS "lastMdferId", A.last_mdfcn_dt AS "lastMdfcnDt", A.last_mdfer_ip AS "lastMdferIp"
FROM im_mmbr_expt_sbj A WHERE A.del_yn = 'N' AND member_srl = #{memberSrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND exemp_sbj_dvsn = #{exempSbjDvsn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY A.frst_reg_dt DESC
